name: Bibo
tag_list: drink-app, social-drink, social-drink-rating, drink-rating, drink-image, bibo, bibo-app
overview:
Bibo for the iPhone

What is Bibo? Bibo is a free application that helps you and your friends discover, rate and share drinks. When you’re out and about , use Bibo to discover and share new drinks. Bibo will show images and ratings of drinks from all the bars around you. Connect with your friends and see what kind of drinks they’ve discovered.

Whether your looking for a new bar or restaurant around town or traveling and want to find a specific drink, Bibo is the perfect app for you.

When is Bibo going to launch? Bibo has a beta launch date of November 1st, 2012. Based on the beta testing we will announce the official launch date. (If your interested in Beta testing send us a message at beta (at)biboapp.com )

When was Bibo founded? Bibo co-founders Natan Antolin, Mac McClian, Steve Jacobson met in late 2011 while working on a job search management website in Seattle. While not being able to decided on a mutual that served the drinks they wanted the idea of Bibo was born. After a few months of research, design and development we have decided to go full-time on developing Bibo. With the wire-frames and design set the coding of the app is in full swing.

Who will use Bibo? Anyone looking to find a drink. Bars and restaurants looking to promote their drinks Anyone looking to leave a review of the drink they tried Friends sharing and recommending drinks to their friends

How can you participate in Bibo? When we finish developing Bibo anyone with an iPhone will be able to use Bibo. We are planning on developing an android application later on.

How can my business or brand work with Bibo? Whether you’re a neighborhood bar, a national chain or a brand, Bibo can get our drink menu on to our platform so your new potential customers can find your business. Please email hello(at)Biboapp.com for information on how to start working with Bibo.
